subject: Anyone Need Transmitter For SPIRICOM device?
author: John
full_text:
I have posted a Heathkit ham radio transmitter for sale on eBay for a
very reasonable amount if anyone is interested? I have just decided
that it is time for me to do other things but it is ideal for anyone
wanting to put together their own SPIRICOM device. I just wanted to
let anyone know in case they were looking for a nice working unit? It
is only a 1 day sale so grab it if you want. The link to my sale is
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=130217909866

Thank you and have a great day all!

John Miller
